highlights.title: The highlights Schema

items.title: A Schema
examples: This being the theory I hold, why need I be afraid of not being able to reconcile it with the case of my ancestors?
The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains.
Do you really believe that they charged an armed enemy, or treated their children, their own flesh and blood, so cruelly, without a thought for their own interest or advantage?
This being the theory I hold, why need I be afraid of not being able to reconcile it with the case of my ancestors?
The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains.
Do you really believe that they charged an armed enemy, or treated their children, their own flesh and blood, so cruelly, without a thought for their own interest or advantage?
This being the theory I hold, why need I be afraid of not being able to reconcile it with the case of my ancestors?
The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains.
Do you really believe that they charged an armed enemy, or treated their children, their own flesh and blood, so cruelly, without a thought for their own interest or advantage?

highlights.title: The highlights Schema

items.title: A Schema
examples: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of reprobating pleasure and extolling pain arose.
But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?
Can you then suppose that those heroic men performed their famous deeds without any motive at all?
Won Champion in the Division A District X Speech Evaluation Contest of Toastmasters International
Tell me, pray, what explanation do you put upon their actions?

items.title: A Schema
examples: Made it to the Top 5 (selected from over 100 teams) in the world for the semi-finals of the SCG Bangkok Business Challenge #sym.at Sasin 2020 Global Competition held at Bangkok, Thailand from July 7-12, 2020.

highlights.title: The highlights Schema

items.title: A Schema
examples: Created an AI-powered resume editor application that allowed users to easily create different resumes and cover letters specifically tailored to and customized for individual job descriptions based on their personal information in their complete curriculum vitae.
Acquired more than 100,000 user sign ups in 3 months and more than 10,000 active monthly users in its lifetime before being sold to investors.
Generated profit of upwards \$20,000 yearly with a team of only four developers and three business operatives

reference.title: The reference Schema
examples: John was a great student. He was always eager to learn new things and was very passionate about his studies. As his mentor, I am proud to say that he was also a great leader and was able to lead his team to victory in the 2020 SCG Bangkok Business Challenge Global Competition.

references.name: Dr. Jane Austin
references.reference: John was a great student. He was always eager to learn new things and was very passionate about his studies. As his mentor, I am proud to say that he was also a great leader and was able to lead his team to victory in the 2020 SCG Bangkok Business Challenge Global Competition.
